Review.Titre: Horrible Customer Service, Horrible Product Support
Review.Contenu: Purchased their P5 headphones just a bit over a year ago for a review. When reviewed, everything was great. Sound was amazing, build quality was on par. But then I started having problems with muffled audio. I always kept them charged, cleaned, and stored. I hadn't used them more than a handful of times through the year. Now i am only days past the warranty date, but a defective product is still a defective product. I reached out to customer service(ABSOLUTELY GARBAGE, FIX YOUR CUSTOMER SERVICE AGENTS) and was basically told I'm screwed, buy another pair. No solution was offered other than "it's out of warranty. But we are selling the headphones at a discount right now if you are interested" I get being out of warranty, but the only solution you offer is basically to tell us to screw off and purchase another one? Take care of your customers, and your customers will take care of you. I have already removed my positive review video off of YouTube and I will be posting another shortly to detail this experience to possible future customers. Do better Gravastar.EDIT: After contacting them again as requested here, I GOT THE EXACT SAME RESPONSE. Trying to get me to purchase another pair. Congratulations, you lost a customer.
It says on the website if i buy a mars pro speaker i will get a free gan charger but i didnt get any. Misleading

Order again - my mistake - an item on pre-order.They invited my son to a discord forum and he received abuse from these guys for no reason. Then on top they cancelled my preorder after I asked a question. Muppets unbelievable.Stay away from these clowns.

Review.Titre: These guys are nothing but low class…
Review.Contenu: These guys are nothing but low class ppl, really poor. Mentality and I believe they are buffoons, customer service levels are in the gutter.Good luck to future purchases. Never buy again.

Scammer. I order items which I never received. They refuse to refund me or send products. I have reported them to BBB and fraud prevention websites.

Review.Titre: I ordered a pair of headphones from…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a pair of headphones from them which never arrived but tracking information showed them as delivered. They told me that I’d have to take it up with the couriers as once it leaves them, it’s not their responsibility. Funnily enough, they used Amazon Logistics to deliver them. When I contacted Amazon Logistics, they told me that I need to speak to the seller as they are responsible for getting the goods to me, not Amazon. The sellers did offer to send me a replacement pair, but wanted to charge me $20 for delivery. I told them that I would not pay the delivery charge as it’s not my fault they never came. They then offered me a refund, minus the original shipping fee. Again I declined saying that they should give me a full refund as it’s not my fault they were not delivered, and I told them I would put a dispute through to Paypal. Unfortunately for me, PayPal took there side in the case I filed as the tracking information provided by Gravastar, shows they were delivered. Even though there is no signature, name taken or photographic evidence of delivery. I’m now stuck with £105.94 bill that I have to pay. Even though the goods were never received, AND I have witnesses at work who will confirm that they did not come. I’ve emailed them several times as Amazon Logistics said that the seller needs to open a non delivery dispute with them, but now Gravastar are not replying to my emails! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!! DO NOT BUY FROM THEM AND LEARN FROM MY MISTAKE ☹️

I purchased the new "3-pod" speaker, which came with a free robot charger. Products look absolutely awesome and the idea is great. However, given low quality of sound itself this is a disappointing purchase for this price. One should not need 2 speakers for "spatial feel", and there is basically no bass at all. Shipping cost me almost 25 pounds as well, so there is that on top. Would not recommend.

Review.Titre: You dont have to choose, have it all!
Review.Contenu: Gravastar really pushes the envelope when it come to esthetics OR usefulness. As an avid techie/gamer/ and scifi fan. I love that they prioritize both. Not only do the pieces look amazing, but the power and functionality is on point. I started out with just a set of earpods and now i own almost 2 of every type of item they sell for my office and daily use around the house. Im not sponsored or endorsed in any way and would highly recommend Gravastar if you or anyone you know has the same taste as mine. Im in love with my gear and standby the company and the community. For the sake of transparency any tech from any company can sometimes be a little tricky to figure out or might have a hiccup but the customer service and the community really comes together to help when asked. Couldnt ask for more…. But i want more, products i mean! If you wanna know more before you buy just find the community on discord or any social media platform!Sincerely, Gravastar superfan, katullyst
I had gotten 2 this year and switching out between the 2. The audio never changes an its nice having two different cases. It's worth the money cause there better that iphone airpods

I bought a pair of the Mars Pro speakers, and had an overall very good experience.  The shipping was faster than promised, and the speakers were well packed, so damage in transit is much less likely.  The sound is great, and the speakers themselves seem very well constructed.  Pairing the speakers, both individually or to get stereo sound was reasonably straight-forward.On the downside, the default volume of the shut down sound will disturb people when it's late at night and things are quiet, and there doesn't seem to be any way to change the volume of any of the default sounds.  It would also be nice if Gravastar would offer a 3.5mm output to two speaker usb-c cable, especially as they have a single speaker connector cable in the box.  If you want stereo video, you have to use Bluetooth, and signal lag with video makes it disconcerting to watch video when the sound doesn't match the action, or worse the speakers lips!Based on the purchase experience, excellent sound quality, and their solid construction, I would absolutely recommend them, but in a situation where stereo video is important to you, not so much.
Top quality materials, design, and performance. All things most companies fail at. Thx 4 not b'n a con artist!! Greatly appreciated!!

Review.Titre: Gravastar, the sounds of the future!
Review.Contenu: I have been using Gravastar speakers and headphones for almost a year now, I own two Mars Pro Aurochs, a pair of Sirius pro and a few months ago I got my hands on the Sirius P5 with all of their cases (except for the Christmas one sadly).The speakers (even one by itself) is Incredible! The sound quality is just mind blowing with a bass so deep it shakes my soul with each beat! The design of the speaker still amazes me to this day; especially with it's colourful RGB effects.The Sirius Pro earbuds were my first true wireless headphones experience, they felt comfortable and secure to wear as I am constantly on the move at work. The case for the earbuds are extremely sturdy with its metal framing so breaking them would be nearly impossible! The sound quality is still brilliant; but I prefer the Sirius P5 as they have fine funes the earbuds into mini portable power houses for your ears! Even the case designs are amazing! Not to mention the community sharing their posts and ideas for redecorating the speakers to fit their style.

I started out with the Sirius P5 earbuds after seeing them on the TechZone Youtube channel and was not disappointed with the style or sound quality.  Satisfied with the earbuds I also purchased a set of SuperNova speakers which have not only become my go-to portables when I'm out and about but the style constantly has friends, Family and even strangers wanting to know more about them. Shipping was resonably quick despite being half way around the world from me, And any shipping issues and inquiries were handled reasonably quick.

Review.Contenu: I bought a few items now and love it so far.like I have 5 robots charger and one black star speaker.with out mentioning the other stuff on the way that how I like this brand name.
Every product I have recieved has been amazing. The sound quality is excellent and the chargers have been great as a travel charger. Highly recommend

great company, very good quality. i got the Sirius-pro earbuds and they sound and feel great, I'm impressed with they build quality, sound and packaging. they arrived in only 6 days after i bought them. i also joined the discord and everyone there is really kind so i don't know what the other reviewers are talking about but i would defiantly buy from them again

The sound quality of the Sirius P5 it's amazing, the customer service it's good too. The only feedback I can leave it's that we need more gadget with those wonderful designs for smartphones, like... A Fan cooler, or a power bank :DI know it's not that easy, but I would love use something more in my phone with those great designs, something cool and useful for any phone model.

This thing is so sick, easily the coolest gadget I own now. The speaker itself is very high quality, and very well made, and has a nice sturdy heft to it. The sound is crystal clear, and has a very deep bass, and is quite loud. And the light settings are bright and effective when being used as a lantern. The shipping took longer than expected and was a little inconsistent with tracking updates, but that's the only downside I can think of. I'd definitely order from them again, and I certainly plan on it!
Gravastar products always arrive before i expect them to, the sci-fi tech look to their products is truly one-of-a-kind

Review.Titre: Gravastar, You Guys are Objectively Amazing!
Review.Contenu: i have been into gravastar products ever since i discovered them, and i now own a venus, sirius pro war damaged yellow, and the alpha 65 charger. My venus has been with me for around 6 months and i use it for literally EVERYTHING, from gaming to music to movies, and the sound is always good. seriously, the amount of power that little guy has is stunning! As for my sirius pros and alpha 65, i got them in the bundle a little under a week ago. they delivered literally 3 days after i ordered them, and i have been obsessed ever since! the sirius pros are great for travel; my music has never sounded so good. Alpha is my new desk-top buddy, providing fuel to my essential gadgets and looking snazzy all at once! All in all, the aesthetic isn’t the only thing going for this company. Gravastar provides an amazing experience, from excellent customer service to sleek sci-fi tech with rugged and functional designs. The war damaged color does in fact feel as if it has been through a war; the excellent paint and weathering ensures that.
Honestly the speakers are phenomenal best speakers I ever purchased, they are so loud too just like I’m in my car and I love that so much!!! Infinite/10 would purchase again.
